sections.heading: with an animal; penalty.A person commits indecency with an animal when such person subjects an animal to sexual penetration as defined in section 28-318
sections.text: Indecency with an animal is a Class III misdemeanor. A person convicted under this section may also be subject to section 28-1019.SourceLaws 1977,

28-1010.Indecency with an animal; penalty.

A person commits indecency with an animal when such person subjects an animal to sexual penetration as defined in section 28-318. Indecency with an animal is a Class III misdemeanor. A person convicted under this section may also be subject to section 28-1019.

SourceLaws 1977, LB 38, § 216;Laws 1978, LB 748, § 16;R.S.1943, (1989), § 28-1003;Laws 1990, LB 50, § 3;Laws 2009, LB97, § 16;Laws 2013, LB329, § 4.
